answers.answer: it appears that you have fatty liver.  using a statin to treat the hypercholesterolemia may help the abnormal liver tests but they need to be followed closely as statins can also cause the liver tests to rise. weight loss is the may to go; recent data suggests that taking vitamin e may also be helpful
